title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip')
4. Begin exporting to the zip file

Results:
An error message box pops up, stating that problems were encountered during the export. The error message provides details about the file with the same name in project2 being the problem.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file
EB: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails, and an error is displayed mentioning the specific file causing the problem
SR: The export functionality should handle the scenario of multiple files with the same name under different directories and successfully export them to the zip file without any errors.
